review: I wish I had this a long time ago! I wish there was more good free content but $99/year for Prime and $8/ month for Hulu (the services I subscribed to) are great.I'm still getting use to the system. When I switch my TV to HDMI to watch the Fire Stick TV, the screen is black, I have to press home on the remote which is wierd (maybe it's my TV, idk).The remote is small. It's nice the way it fits in my hand. However, I feel like it's going to get lost A LOT. I downloaded the app on my iPhone so at least I have a backup.So far, I'm very happy. I can't wait to use it more.
